p: Nine trials [7]â€“ [9], [14], [16], [23], [27], [29], [31] reported the effect of Chinese herbs individually or in combination with oseltamivir on the duration of flu-like symptoms. Among them, two trials demonstrated better effect favoring Chinese herbs: Qingwen Tuire Decoction combined with oseltamivir shortened the duration of flu-like symptoms compared to oseltamivir alone [29], and Fanggan Granule had shorter duration of flu-like symptoms compared to symptomatic treatment [8].
